result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Information filed.  Rivard-NG.  CT-NG entered.

CASES: 15CF214, 14CF218, 14CT67, 14TR1992 & 14CF382
15CF214-Count 2-NC plea.  CT-accept plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.  All other counts/citations/cases DRI.  CT finds waiver of PSI.  
Qualify for CIP & Substance Abuse pgm.  
SENTENCE:  w/h sentence, probation up to 1 yr.  DNA sample, no surcharge.  Follow recomm of probation.  COMPAS.  Follow thru on MH regimen.  No firearms, cannot vote until civil rights restored, cannot hold elected office, no body armor, other civil rights may be lost until restored, if not US citizen face deportation or loss of other citizenship rights. Credit for 17 days of sentence credit.  Impose 6 mo conditional time if revoked, subj to WR, no GT.  CT costs waived.  Must report to probation w/in next 48 hours.  PCR.  11:33 am adj.

CASES: 15CF214, 14CF218, 14CT67, 14TR1992, 14CF382. Defendant Jason C Olsen in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Defendant Jason C Olsen in custody.  Stephen C. Dorrance appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 2:50 pm.  Atty Rivard on underlying files.  15CF214-bond was set.  CT reduces bond to $500 cash bond, modified on its face.  JA to set 15CF214 for PH w/in 20 days w/ atty Rivard, other cases to track.  No Contact modified to no abusive contact w/ Sherry Youngmark - modified on its face.  2:53 pm adj.

Not to possess or consume alcohol.  Not to possess or use drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Subject to testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  Not to have contact with: Sherry Youngmark.
